subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Thierry Henry scored his first M.L.S. hat trick and set up a goal to lead the Red Bulls to a 5-2 victory over the expansion Montreal Impact in Harrison, N.J.
snippet: Thierry Henry scored his first M.L.S. hat trick and set up a goal to lead the Red Bulls to a 5-2 victory over the expansion Montreal Impact in Harrison, N.J.
